scripts.build: next build && next export && move out\_next out\next && move out\next ..\extension && powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Filter *.html | ForEach-Object { (Get-Content -Raw $_.FullName) -replace '/_next', './next' | Set-Content -Path $_.FullName -Force }" && move out\*.html ..\extension && robocopy public\assets ..\extension\assets
scripts.remove: node -e "const rimraf = require('rimraf'); const fs = require('fs-extra'); fs.readdir('../extension', (err, files) => { files.forEach(file => { if (file !== 'manifest.json') rimraf.sync('../extension/' + file); }); })"
